Cost of the Construction of boundary=\((rate_1)\times(perimeter)\)
so the perimeter= \(_{{trunc(pi_val*2*j*k,2)}}_\over _{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow 2\times \pi r=_{{trunc(pi_val*2*j,2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) r=\(_{{trunc(pi_val*2*j,2)}}_\times 7\over {2\times 22}\)
\(\Rightarrow r=_{j}_\)
Area of the field=\(\pi r^2=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j,2)}}_\)
Cost of cultivating=\(area\times rate_1=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j,2)}}_\times _{l}_\)
\(\Rightarrow cost=Rs\,_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*l,2)}}_\)

content.text:
The cost of construction of the boundary in a cricket field at a rate of Rs _{k}_/metre is _{{trunc(pi_val*2*j*k,2)}}_.
